data.actual_result: When clicking "Edit Catergory" the Button to save is already there when you didn't edit anything and it doesn't dissapers when clicking on it to save
data.expected_result: The Save Button should only appear when something has changed in settings
data.short_description: When editing a Category the Save Button is there when you didn't edit anything and doesn't dissapers after clicking on it to save
data.steps_to_repro: - Click and hold on a Catergory - Click "Edit Catergory" and observe and try to click on it to save
